ygData.subject: Re: Wizard what are we? (Long, hmm very long)
ygData.msgSnippet: You are all nuts.  Wizards are great as they are.  Want to run faster?  Get JM boots?  want to have a chance to run, use your skin series spells.  want heals?
ygData.messageBody:
You are all nuts. Wizards are great as they are. Want to run faster? Get
JM boots? want to have a chance to run, use your skin series spells. want
heals? get squad rings and potions. but nothing anyone else can get can
match the sheer devastation we inflict. i am well past the halfway mark to
50, and let me tell you, the smile on my face keeps getting bigger. just
make it past the hump, around 20 your deaths become less frequent if you are
smart and do not try soloing often. remember, nothing replaces what another
class can do, ever.

Kalleon Valkyrre
Karana
